author: thetaoist
content: Hey all. Looking for threshold support. I have been lurking and learning as suggested and would appreciate being specifically tasked to earn any help or guidance to where I could best participate.

author: pipermerriam
content: try inverting that.  handing out tasks isn't exactly how this work.  find a project you are interested in, figure out how you are able to contribute and add value, ask specific questions when you've done your homework and still can't figure something out.
